name: Tanks: Cat's War
description:
Get ready to blow it up ! In Tank : Cat's War, you play as adorable little kitties driving paw-erful tanks. Shoot your enemy and collect power-ups to help you win ! Across 3 cute maps, be the best and win the Cat's War !

--- Create by ---

Graphics  :
  - Léa HOAREAU
 - Lucas MICHELAT
 - Bruno DAVILA

Developer :
  - Matthieu OSTEN
 - Enzo VIDAL
